page.title: 14Religions
page.content: Religions There are many religions in the community. One religion is Islam whose god is Allah. Muslims (followers of Islam) celebrate Eid (festival), one in June or July, one in September or October. Christians go to Church on Sunday to pray. They celebrate Christmas on December 25th. when Jesus was born. Hindus have many gods. Rama and Krishna being reincarnations of the god Vishnu. Hindus have a special day called Diwali that celebrates the return of Rama from exile. Sikhs also have many gods. They worship in a Gudwara. Many Sikhs wear a turban and do not cut their hair. Guru Nanak is their founder.Judaism also has special festivals - two are Passover, to celebrate their liberation from slavery in Egypt and Chunnukah,the Festival of Lights.
